name: Lost Island survivor: Lovely grandpa
description:
Lost Island survivor is a serious game that can captivate you.
I have bad news, you are the main character who has to solve all the riddles of his beloved grandfather, while fighting off groups of bandits and zombies at the same time.

You have had a strange feeling about your grandfather for several weeks now. Earlier you received a letter from him, and you knew for sure that in the coming holidays you would definitely visit your beloved grandfather on his island. But a year and a half has passed since the last visit. But there is no letter or other news from the island. This may mean that the grandfather is in trouble or he has gone crazy due to loneliness. You have to find the answer to this question.

Opponents attack in groups, exchanging information with each other. Your task is to find or make a cold weapon or firearm to effectively combat them. Enemies can not only be killed with weapons, but also knocked down by a car, fortunately, your grandfather left you an inheritance.
By the way, you have at your disposal a large inventory of 1000 kg. In it you can store provisions, materials for paying for services in the village, and much more. The crafting system, in addition to creating weapons, allows you to cook food, without which it is impossible to survive.
Look for everything that can help you survive on this cruel island to unravel the main secret of your grandfather.

  • Nice graphics
  • Various enemies
  • Survival mode
  • Pleasant music
  • Interesting quests
  • Artificial intelligence
  • Interaction with objects and characters
  • Inventory system
